text:
On Windows NT 4.0 SP6a failed the automated creation of an Apache2 service. I 
used the installation mode for running the apache service for all users. I have 
made a complete log in repait mode. There I could see that the service should 
generated after a reboot. If you need more Information or my log file please 
let me know. I can work now, because I installed the service manually. Many 
thanks for your nice work!!!
creator: swinter@ast-computertechnik.de

text: *** Bug 9712 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
Was there any possibility that 1) networking was not running when you attempted
  to install, or 2) that port 80 was in use at the time (by IIS or another web
  server?)


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8925 ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
